title: Chungnung berin a thiltih mak
lyrics:
Chungnung berin a thiltih mak,
A rukin a zo vek;
Tuifinriatah a thawh a lang,
Van thli chungah a chuang.

Thuk takah hmun hmuh theih lovah,
Finna a thukru a;
A tum apiang a khawl khawm a,
A Lal duhzawng a ti.

Mi thianghlimte u, hlau suh u,
Van khawdur hlauhawm chu;
Zahngaihnnain a khat, in chungah,
Malsawmnain a sur.

I rinin Pathian sawisel suh,
A thatna ringhlel suh;
Rorelna fing hnungah Pa hmel,
Tha leh lawmawm a tel.

Pathian thutiam a hmin ang a,
Ni tin hlen a tum fo;
A hel laiin a thur thei e,
A hmin erawh a thlum.

Nimahsela, mihring rilru,
Ring lovin a bo vang;
Pathian a inhriattir ang chu,
Zan chhunah a chang ang.

Rin lohvin rilru mit a del,
A thawh mai a ringhlel;
Pathian a awm, lei hi a veng,
Engkim a hrilh fiah ang.
